description: Look sharp? Check. Feel comfortable? Check. With their Men’s Merino Sport 150 Short Sleeve Button Down, you get the best of both worlds. Made with responsibly sourced Merino wool, this shirt gives you temperature regulation, odor control, and moisture management so you can feel fresh whether you’re under the scorching sun at a ballgame or meeting a blind date. Plus, it’s made with flatlock seams to help prevent chafing. For those times when you want to look good and feel good too, this button down is the key.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 SS Button Down - Mens
